title: 請鍵盤戰士幫忙搶攻外國輿論陣地

replies.msg:
外國現在係日頭，好多外國人都睇緊網上新聞報導，請各位幫忙帶出佔領者5大訴求以顯出佔領者並非為鬧事而佔領，爭取外國支持

以下有小弟簡短示範，請各位高人跟帖改進

Young protesters facing criminal charge of 10-year sentencing but still broke into the Legco for demanding actions from government that millions of Hongkongers have made very clear through several peaceful demostrations in the past few weeks. They demand the following 5 actions from the government:
"5 Demands"
1) Abolition of the Extradition Amendment Bill;
2) Unconditional release of all arrested and no posthumous prosecutions;
3) Withdrawal of allegation of Rioting;
4) Hold to account the police for brutality and abuse of power; and
5) Abolition of Functional Constituencies of the current Legco and prompt installation of full universal suffrage for the Chief Executive and Legco.

Please support Hongkongers and save them from the Communist China.
